moves.5. Be2 O-O 6. Nc3: Probably better is c4, but this is sound.
moves.6... d5 7. O-O Re8 8. Ne1: ? I am not sure why he decided to let me follow through on my idea although I do not think he could stop it.
moves.13... Bh3 14. Rf2: Played very quickly.  Perhaps the reason behind the g3, but i do not see him getting an advantage from the rook on f2 especially when he cannot double his rooks on the file anytime soon.
moves.14... Qd7 15. Bf1 Bg4 16. Qd2 Rad8: So far it is just a dance.
moves.18... Qxd5 19. Qxd5 Rxd5 20. Bg2 Nf3+ 21: I prefer black in this position.
moves.24. b4: And declining rook trade but accepting bishop trade.
moves.24... Rc2 25. Rb1 Bh6: No to the bishop trade.  Yes to the rook trade.  26.e4? Rxc1+ 27.Rxc1 Bxc1.
moves.26. Rf2: A touch surprised this move was this slow in coming.
moves.33... Re3 34. a4 b5 35. a5: Rc2?  This endgame is black's to win.
